04-23-2011, 08:24 PM #1 joe45 View Profile View Forum Posts Registered User Join Date: Jan 2005 Posts: 344 Rep Power: 0 fast thing to eat to give enough energy to lift what a cheap or fast thing to eat to get enough energy to lift weights in the gym. im thinking a peanut butter sandwich and a protein drink is enough|????
what else??? someone said a snickers bar, oh henry bar helps in giving you energy and power to lift but does it really. is it healthy. how much energy it gives 04-23-2011, 08:33 PM #2 Marc.o View Profile View Forum Posts Registered User Join Date: Oct 2008 Age: 28 Posts: 70 Rep Power: 29 An apple 04-23-2011, 08:37 PM #3 Dean6917 View Profile View Forum Posts Registered User Join Date: Oct 2006 Location: montreal, quebec, Canada Age: 42 Stats: 6'0", 215 lbs Posts: 1,048 BodyPoints: 3698 Rep Power: 688 a banana 04-23-2011, 08:38 PM #4 5nine View Profile View Forum Posts Registered User Join Date: Apr 2008 Stats: 6'0", 208 lbs Posts: 91 Rep Power: 22 Originally Posted by joe45 what a cheap or fast thing to eat to get enough energy to lift weights in the gym. im thinking a peanut butter sandwich and a protein drink is enough|????
what else??? someone said a snickers bar, oh henry bar helps in giving you energy and power to lift but does it really. is it healthy. how much energy it gives cup of coffee - its cheap perhaps with snikers bar?
or you can try something like jack3d or anything on that line... 04-23-2011, 08:55 PM #5 Stoney0102 View Profile View Forum Posts Registered User Join Date: Jun 2007 Location: Charlotte, North Carolina, United States Age: 26 Posts: 49 BodyPoints: 691 Rep Power: 0 flat coke/pepsi, or get some waxy maze for that shake.
